## KMS.sign() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

sign Uint8Array with giv KmsKeyIden

**Signature:**

```typescript
sign(keyId: KmsKeyId, data: Uint8Array): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyId | [KmsKeyId](./polygonid-js-sdk.kmskeyid.md) | key id |
|  data | Uint8Array | prepared data bytes |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

`Promise<Uint8Array>` - return signature
